title.rendered: Clinical Operations and Regulatory Affairs Staffing

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”The Clinical Research Associate, Field Monitor & Clinical Trial Staffing Agency” module_class=”page-hero-template” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|700||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#29295b” title_line_height=”1.4em” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_text_color=”#777e84″ subhead_font_size=”15px” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/home.jpg” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”165px|80px|165px|80px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”95px|51px|95px|51px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”” title_font_size_phone=”21px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#29295b” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||8px||false|false”]

The Clinical Trial Experts.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”18px”]Clinical operations and regulatory affairs candidates are in high demand and we work very closely with our candidates to provide them the best opportunities for career and personal growth. We are working with exciting and innovative companies with ground-breaking technology looking for professionals like you![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_enable_image=”off” width=”100%” max_width=”2560px” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/lab-hero.jpeg” custom_padding=”201px||201px||true|false”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#add8eb” custom_padding=”69px|73px|69px|73px|true|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”||10px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”19px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

We place staff in the biotechnology, pharmaceutical & medical device verticals, filling positions such as:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Clinical Trial Operations” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Clinical Research Associates” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Clinical Trial Associates” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Clinical Monitors” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Clinical Documentation” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”TMF Associate/Manager” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Clinical Project Manager/Clinical Trial Manager” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_line_height=”1.8em”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” custom_margin=”8px||||false|false” custom_padding=”22px||10px||false|false” border_color_top=”#e9f2f7″]Regulatory Affairs[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_text_color=”#29295b”]

  • Strategic Planning
  • Pre/Post Marketing
  • Submissions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ width=”100%” max_width=”2560px” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin_tablet=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding_tablet=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” gutter_width__hover_enabled=”on|desktop”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ae4542″ text_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” width=”88%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-69px||||false|false” custom_padding=”48px|61px|48px|61px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset3″]At ClinLab we know how valuable clinical trial professionals are to the growth and progress of the company. We take pride in qualified professionals for either contract or permanent positions.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”69px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_text_color=”#777e84″ text_font_size=”16px”]We take the time to understand the needs of our clients with the expectations of candidates to achieve the best and most long term fit. [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”23px” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]We understand this industry and will work endlessly to find the right fit for each party.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/facemasks.jpeg” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_testimonial author=”Lena Simmons” job_title=”Clinical Research Associate” portrait_url=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/division-clinlab.jpg” quote_icon=”off” quote_icon_color=”#ae4542″ quote_icon_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ body_font=”||||||||” author_text_color=”#29295b” author_font_size=”16px” position_font=”||on||||||” position_text_color=”#ae4542″ use_background_color=”off” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”]I can’t say enough about ClinLab, as a Clinical Research Associate, ClinLab was incredibly responsive, listened to my goals and found a placement with a top CRO that is an excellent fit for me.[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#e9edee”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Contact our Team” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|300||on|||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”23px” custom_padding=”36px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”32px” text_font_size_phone=”22px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”]Contact our team directly:[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”|2%||2%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”5%||||false|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_blurb title=”Carly Sullivan” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%153%%” icon_color=”#29295b” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”22px” admin_label=”Carly Sullivan” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_orientation=”center”]

Clinical Division Account Manager
E: csullivan@clinlabstaffing.com

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”|2%||2%|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”5%||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Candidates Submit your Resume” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”apply now” button_one_url=”/search-jobs/submit-resume/” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.45)” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/healthcare.jpeg” parallax=”on” custom_button_one=”on” button_one_text_size=”15px” button_one_text_color=”#29295b” button_one_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_one_border_width=”0px” button_one_border_radius=”0px” button_one_font=”|||on|||||” button_one_use_icon=”off” button_one_custom_padding=”12px|40px|12px|40px|true|true” custom_padding=”157px||157px||true|false” button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_one_bg_color__hover=”#add8eb” button_one_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section]
